com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning

Interface Decision

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Decision>

    public interface Decision
extends Comparable<Decision>
    A single probabilised decision used to construct a particular solution.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAuthority(String authority)
      Add an authority to this decision's list.
      List<String> getAuthorities()
      A list of decision authorities which helped to make this decision.

      A unique code representing this decision's outcome.
      double getProbability()
      This decision's probability.
      double getProbabilityLog()
      The log of this decision's probability.
      double getScore()
      The decision's raw score, for additive scoring systems (e.g.
      boolean isStatistical()
      Was this decision calculated by a statistical model, or was it made by default, based on rules, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getOutcome

        String getOutcome()
        A unique code representing this decision's outcome.
        Returns:

      • getScore

        double getScore()
        The decision's raw score, for additive scoring systems (e.g. perceptrons).
        Returns:

      • getProbability

        double getProbability()
        This decision's probability.
        Returns:

      • getProbabilityLog

        double getProbabilityLog()
        The log of this decision's probability. Avoids calculating the log multiple times.
        Returns:

      • isStatistical

        boolean isStatistical()
        Was this decision calculated by a statistical model, or was it made by default, based on rules, etc.
        Returns:

      • getAuthorities

        List<String> getAuthorities()
        A list of decision authorities which helped to make this decision. Useful when decisions are made by different authorities based on certain criteria - allows us to establish an f-score by authority, as well as analysing errors by authority.
        Returns:

      • addAuthority

        void addAuthority(String authority)
        Add an authority to this decision's list.
        Parameters:
        authority -
